branchCategory.name: LECPA
branchCategory.description: The LECPA is a driver for LE’s 24VDC step motors. This driver controls motion by interpreting a pulse input signal from the PLC instead of calls to a step data table. Separate control and motor power enable the motor to be turned off without losing the encoder position. Additional features include alarm detection and in-range AREA output signals.

branchItem.name: LECPA Step Motor Driver, Pulse Input Type for LEY Series
branchItem.description: The LECPA is a driver for LE’s 24VDC step motors. This driver controls motion by interpreting a pulse input signal from the PLC instead of calls to a step data table. Separate control and motor power enable the motor to be turned off without losing the encoder position. Additional features include alarm detection and in-range AREA output signals.
branchItem.bullets:
<UL> <LI>Pulse signal input types permitted: open collector, differential <LI>Compatible motor: 24VDC step motor with incremental A/B phase encoder <LI>NPN or PNP parallel I/O types <LI>POWER and ALARM LED’s <LI>Screw or DIN rail mounting <LI>Configuration software required (sold separately)
</LI></UL>
